map.name: Skill Issue
map.objective: Capture the Wool in 2 minutes, or prevent the Rusher from doing so!

pages.page:
`2» `lRUSHER ROULETTE `2» Overview`r
One player is chosen as the `4`lRusher`r and has `6`o2 minutes`r to capture the wool.
The rest are `9`lDefenders`r who must stop them.

`2» `lRUSHER ROULETTE `2» Rounds`r
The game has `6`o5 rounds.`r
If a `4`lRusher`r captures the wool, they win.
If no one does after 5 rounds, the `9`lDefenders`r win.

`2» `lRUSHER ROULETTE `2» Rotation`r
If the Rusher fails to capture, a `6`orandom player`r is selected to be the next `4`lRusher.`r
The map is `6reset`r after every round.

`2» `lRUSHER ROULETTE `2» Perks`r
After each round, the next `4`lRusher`r gains a `a`operk`r that can give them a boost or make things harder for the `9`lDefenders`r.
Perks stack as the game goes on.

apply.message: You may not modify this area!
You may not build in the void!

You may not modify this area!
You may not modify this area!
You may not enter the wool monument!
You may not enter the wool room!
You may not destroy the wool room!
You may not modify the wool room!

respawn.message: Blitz is active, you won't respawn unless the round restarts

message.title: Welcome to `l"Skill Issue"
message.subtitle: A `aRusher Roulette`r Map
message.text: ${ANNOUNCER_PREFIX} Welcome to `l"Skill Issue"`r, a `aRusher Roulette`r map!
${ANNOUNCER_PREFIX} In this game, you'll be chosen either as the `4`lRusher`r or as a `9`lDefender.
${ANNOUNCER_PREFIX} If you're the `4`lRusher`r, your goal is to capture the `4Red Wool`r at the monument on the other side of the field.
${ANNOUNCER_PREFIX} If you're a `9`lDefender`r, your job is to stop the `4Rusher`r at all costs.
${ANNOUNCER_PREFIX} With each round, the `4Rusher`r earns a new `aPerk`r, that either empowers them or weakens the `9Defenders
${ANNOUNCER_PREFIX} The roulette spins... Let the game begin!

message.title: Seems harder than expected...
message.subtitle: What if we give the next rusher a little `e`ogift`r?

message.title: Let's forget that happened
message.subtitle: Here's a little `e`otreat`r for the next

message.title: We've seen worse, don't worry
message.subtitle: Here's a tiny `e`oboost`r for the next

message.title: Are you guys even trying?
message.subtitle: Maybe I can give a little `e`ohelp

message.title: Yikes...
message.subtitle: Let's hand the next Rusher a `e`oboost

message.title: Let's see what we get
message.subtitle: Their perk is: `e`kXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

» There are {amount} `4`lRushers

message.title: Round `e{current}/{total}`r starting soon...
message.subtitle: You're a `9`lDefender`r. Prevent {player} from capturing the wool!

message.title: Round `e{current}/{total}`r starting soon...
message.subtitle: You're a `9`lDefender`r. Prevent the `4Rushers`r from capturing the wool!

message.subtitle: You're a `9`lDefender`r. Prevent the `4Rusher`r from capturing the wool!

{player}'s not that good then...
It looks like {player} loves long matches...

Somehow {player} made the defenders feel safe
I swear is not that difficult, {player} just sucks

message.title: Let's see what we get
message.subtitle: Their perk is: `a`lTriple Health!

message.text: » `a`lTriple Health!
» The Rusher now has triple health. Good luck taking him down...

message.title: Let's see what we get
message.subtitle: Their perk is: `a`lBlockless Defenders!

message.text: » `a`lBlockless Defenders!
» No more giant walls. Defenders have no blocks

message.title: Let's see what we get
message.subtitle: Their perk is: `a`lBowless Defenders!

message.text: » `a`lBowless Defenders!
» No more ranged attacks. Time to fight up close

message.title: Let's see what we get
message.subtitle: Their perk is: `a`lPotion Buff!

message.text: » `a`lPotion Buff!
» The Rusher is buffed up: Speed II, Jump III and Regen I

message.title: Let's see what we get
message.subtitle: Their perk is: `a`lVoid Guard!

message.text: » `a`lVoid Guard!
» Safety first! Barriers cover the void, keeping the Rusher from dropping into the abyss

message.title: Let's see what we get
message.subtitle: Their perk is: `a`lTNT Kit!

message.text: » `a`lTNT Kit!
» The Rusher now carries TNT, redstone, and buttons. Perfect for blasting themselves across the map!

message.title: Let's see what we get
message.subtitle: Their perk is: `a`lMaxed out Gear!

message.text: » `a`lMaxed out Gear!
» The Rusher's kit is now enchanted to the limit. Brace yourselves

message.title: Let's see what we get
message.subtitle: Their perk is: `d`lBlitz + Rage!

message.text: » `d`lBlitz + Rage!
» No respawns are allowed, and every hit is an instant kill

message.title: Let's see what we get
message.subtitle: Their perk is: `d`l2 Rushers!

message.text: » `d`l2 Rushers!
» One was easy... now let's see how you handle two!
